name: Innodeas
tag_list: mobile, applications, website, software, it, mobile-applications, database, embedded, engineering, web-development, 3d, visualization, html, flash, photoshop
overview:
INNODEAS is a software services and IT product development company that provides services in web development, application development and mobile programming.

Their main services include Software Services, IT Product Development, Website Design, Website Development, Application Development, Database Design and Development, Mobile Programming, Embedded Applications, Re-Engineering, Support and Maintenance.

They provide the following services, (but not limited to)

LAMP development - Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP, Perl or Python, Symfony, CakePHP Java development - J2EE, J2ME, Spring, Struts, Hibernate, iBatis .NET development - ASP.NET, Smart-client, Windows Mobile, Silverlight Flash / Flex development - AS2, AS3 AJAX - Scriptaculous, Prototype, Dojo, YUI, Ext JS, MooTools,jQuery Cloud based development - Google AppEngine, Amazon EC2, S3, SalesForce Content Management Systems - Drupal, Joomla Full-text Search - Lucene Document Management - Alfresco, SharePoint Workflows / Business Process Management - jBPM, BizTalk Automated testing services - Selenium Re Engineering - Performance improvement and scaling of existing apps Security testing - SQL injection, XSS attacks Ruby on Rails, RSpec & Mongrel Python & Django Application Development Web Design and Maintenance Mobile Device Programming 3D Visualization (3D modeling rigging, animation using Maya, 3DS Max) 3D Programming using DirectX and Open GL type libraries or Maya Embedded Language Engineering Applications & technical solutions for Data Acquisition, Processing, Simulation

Their expertise Include

Software Development (Application Development) VB, VC++ Microsoft .NET, C#, VB.Net Java, J2EE

Web Development ColdFusion, AIR . Net (Dot Net), ASP.Net, C#, VB.Net ASP, VB, COM, DCOM Java, J2EE, Servlet, JSP PHP Ruby on Rails AJAX, JavaScript

Web Designing, HTML Designing, Graphics Designing, Flash Development

Database Design and Development MSSQL (Microsoft SQL Server), Oracle, Ms Access, MySql ,PostgreSQL

3D Visualization & Programming Maya, 3DS Max, DirectX, OPen GL, Maya Embedded Language
